title: BitcoinVN_News
author: BitcoinVN_News
content: Our team, together with some of the members of the Vietnamese Bitcoin Community, has in recent weeks undertaken the step to translate the original Diamondhands report into Vietnamese - and on that occasion also contribute a Vietnamese chapter to the current state of the Lightning ecosystem in Vietnam.  Koji and his team from Diamondhands have been doing some pretty amazing Japan, building most likely the largest Lightning routing community in any Asian country to date.We hope to take part to inspire and support similar initiatives in Vietnam and across South East Asia  Source article: https://news.bitcoinvn.io/the-vietnamese-lightning-ecosystem/

comments.author: YUriy1991
comments.body: I think this kind of Collaboration and cooperation is critical to the continued growth and success of the Lightning ecosystem and the wider Bitcoin community.

comments.author: beepcitizen
comments.body: Quote from: YUriy1991 on April 04, 2023, 05:10:45 AMI think this kind of Collaboration and cooperation is critical to the continued growth and success of the Lightning ecosystem and the wider Bitcoin community. 1v1 lolI think so, too
